entries.MST_SCENARIO_10001_DESC: Tilith explains Grand Gaia's situation in the Cave of Flames. The Summoner must embark on a far and long journey to defeat the Four Fallen Gods...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10002_DESC: At Egor Snowfield, Tilith mentions the importance of Elements regarding Units. Thunder beats Water, etc... A good thing to consider for future fights.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10003_DESC: The Summoner reaches the Forest of Beasts, where enemies hunt wild animals for food. The usage of Spheres is carefully explained here as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10004_DESC: The humidity in Magutagal Wetlands puts Tilith in a bad mood, though she does shed light on the Sparks created by multiple synchronized attacks.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10005_DESC: Tilith is impressed that the Summoner has been able to reach Mirza's Remains safely. As a reward, she explains the benefits of using Leader Skills.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10006_DESC: Rumors say that a mysterious swordsman lurks in the Monster's Nest. Though Tilith swears she's not afraid, she looks pretty scared indeed...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10007_DESC: Now at the Tower of Mistral, the liberation of the whole region is but a step away. However, Creator Maxwell has built quite a terrifying opponent...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10008_DESC: The Summoner successfully defeats the Juggernaut, earning Tilith's praise. Lucius will now open the way towards the unknown land of Morgan.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10009_DESC: Searching for Tilith, our Summoner enters the Kagan Desert. A coincidental meeting with Karl reveals that he is after the demon Graham.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10010_DESC: At Breeze Beach Tilith hears of a beautiful, yet indifferent swordswoman. However, she's confident that she's much prettier than this rumored beauty.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10011_DESC: Karl hurts himself while pursuing Graham. The Nocturnal Forest is said to be the turf of one of Graham's subordinates who is attacking many Summoners.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10012_DESC: Karl is successful in driving out Graham from the Nocturnal Forest. With nowhere to run, it's time to settle everything in the Asekutt Wastelands.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10013_DESC: Seria, a member of the Demon Slayers, shows herself at the Shrine of Lystia. According to her, Graham is one of Abaddon's most treasured underlings.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10014_DESC: Seria goes belligerent on the Summoner. Though Karl wants to continue to the Destroyed Cathedral as a team of three, Seria's not making it easy...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10015_DESC: Having finally reached Abaddon's stronghold in the Tower of Morgan, Karl and Seria fend off incoming enemies to help the Summoner press forward.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10016_DESC: Abaddon has been defeated. After meeting Karl and once again parting ways, Tilith and the Summoner head towards St. Lamia in search of Maxwell.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10017_DESC: At Volcano Eldent, Tilith warns that ignoring one's duties is unacceptable. She says she has never slacked off when it comes to her job, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10018_DESC: Though Tilith tries to give some background on Sacred Mt. Craylia, she doesn't seem to be doing very well. She has supposedly caught a cold...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10019_DESC: Tilith tries her best to pretend her condition is not aggravating while in the Blood Forest. But it's clear to see it's taking a toll on her...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10020_DESC: Tilith finally confesses about her bad physical condition in Mt. Wistorea. Maxwell's curse affects her even more as she approaches St. Lamia Palace.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10021_DESC: At the Secluded Sanctuary, Tilith finally collapses. Entrusting her to Seria, the Summoner heads towards St. Lamia Palace alone to vanquish the curse.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10022_DESC: After being rescued by Karl, the Summoner goes after Maxwell in St. Lamia Palace. Can Tilith truly be saved from this terrible curse?!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10023_DESC: With the curse broken, Tilith comes back to her normal self, but somehow ends up in a dramatic argument with Seria...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10100_DESC: Once Eriole learns that the Akras Summoners' Hall has opened the southern region of Mistral, he send Paris to Cordelica...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10101_DESC: An encounter with the Demon Slayer Lugina occurs in Greskya Caves. Since he has no respect for the Regular Army, he demands that the Summoner leave.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10102_DESC: At Ignia Falls, Lugina sheds light on how both the Randall Empire and the Akras Summoners' Hall influence life in Elgaia.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10103_DESC: Lugina explains how the Summoner Army works while in Lomass Forest. And as an elite, he demands that the Summoner respect his authority.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10104_DESC: Paris shows herself in Valtan Fortress. She asks the Summoner for cooperation regarding the land survey on Cordelica, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10105_DESC: While heading to the Tower of Light, Paris mentions that the Summoner is a friend of Karl's, but Lugina doesn't buy it. He doesn't seem fond of Karl.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10106_DESC: Paris explains in the Cordelica Mine that a race of giants inhabited the island long ago. It would seem that the god of the giants has awaken as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10107_DESC: While Lugina goes on a mission to defeat the giant god Grantos in the Giant's Ruins, Paris asks the Summoner to demonstrate what real power is.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10108_DESC: Having learned that the Summoner defeated Grantos, Eriole laughs while proclaiming that the world is heading towards the right direction...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10200_DESC: Lucius guides the Summoner to the Palmyna Archipelago, while a certain man in Randall is informed that the barrier over the same islands has vanished.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10201_DESC: The next target is Cardes the Malevolent, another of the Four Fallen Gods. In Julep Village you hear that half of his power is still sealed away.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10202_DESC: Tilith claims not to be scared aboard the Ghost Ship Legnia. However, she does give some information about Palmyna, where Cardes is sealed...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10203_DESC: The Summoner is suddenly attacked by a strange man in Elios Plains. But this mysterious man's presence disappears just as fast as it showed itself.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10204_DESC: A meeting with Seria and Karl in the Saji Mines reveals they are still after Graham. Karl warns the Summoner against someone called Zebra.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10205_DESC: Tilith and her Summoner run into "Elder Grah" in Lamellia Temple. The old man claims to be investigating the folklore linked to the Four Fallen Gods.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10206_DESC: Karl and Seria corner Graham in Ghost Town Edila, but they are blown away by an unknown and powerful force, allowing Graham to escape.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10207_DESC: Showing himself at Amdahl Castle, Elder Grah tells of the vengeful spirit of Amdahl's last emperor, which apparently still lurks about the castle.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10208_DESC: Elder Grah is impressed with the Summoner's ability to vanquish the evil spirit. Seria rushes over, and it seems that she knows the elder somehow.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10209_DESC: Guided by Lucius, the Summoner reaches Encervis. According to Tilith, a human civil war ravaged this land a long time ago.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10210_DESC: After reaching Elsta Crater, Tilith tells the Summoner how hard she's been working so far. However, her claims seem questionable somehow...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10211_DESC: Zebra suddenly attacks at Lake Aldela, but Elder Grah's assistance prevents any serious damage. This powerful enemy seems to live in a floating fort.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10212_DESC: Elder Grah tells of the history of Amdahl while wondering about Castle Avenia. He asks the Summoner to destroy the sky fort, but Tilith's apathetic...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10213_DESC: Zebra and the Dark Figure are found in the Gadillian Ravine talking about how to handle the Summoner. Just what could their relationship be...?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10214_DESC: Seria and Karl search for the Summoner at Alman Mausoleum. They both say they want to use their power to help bring down the sky fort.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10215_DESC: In the Land of the Dead, Tilith reveals that the sky fort's official name is Solaris. She intends to use her powers to help infiltrate it.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10216_DESC: Thanks to Tilith's powers, the infiltration of Sky Fort Solaris is a success. Zebra sees this as an opening to attack the exhausted goddess.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10217_DESC: Zebra has finally been defeated. However, he destroys Solaris trying to bring the Summoner down with him. Who can prevent this tragedy...?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10218_DESC: The Summoner reaches Palmyna through Lucius's guidance. Traces of a kingdom which fought against the gods are still very much apparent here.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10219_DESC: Though initially in Obselion Castle, Tilith heads to Dejour Ruins in a hurry to warn that the seal on Cardes has begun to wear off.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10220_DESC: Grahdens is left alone with the Summoner at Obselion Castle. He shares the story of the 4 Heroes of Palmyna who sealed Cardes the Malevolent away.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10221_DESC: At Emerald Path, Seria and Karl learn that they must travel to the spirit world in order to defeat Cardes. Seria is acting rather strange though...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10222_DESC: While passing through the Grandelt Ruins, Tilith reveals that Cardes's body is slowly disintegrating, and that his godly powers are running rampant.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10223_DESC: In Arlind Seminary, Grahdens expresses his doubts regarding the past and recent movements of the gods. His thoughts seem to influence the Summoner.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10224_DESC: Karl and Seria accompany the Summoner to the gates of the underworld in the Noera Battleground. They are both worried about Tilith.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10225_DESC: The Summoner and the others split up to find Cardes in the Spirit World of Palmyna. Can he be defeated before he destroys everything?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10226_DESC: Just when everyone tries to escape the now crumbling underworld, Seria suffers an injury. In this desperate situation, Tilith appears to save the day.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10300_DESC: After hearing Paris's report, Eriole dispatches her to Lizeria. What could he possibly be looking for?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10301_DESC: Lugina shows up in Erinecht Plains and claims to have a mission much more important than that of the Summoner's. His feisty attitude hasn't changed.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10302_DESC: After reaching Golzo Mountains, it is revealed that Paris is in search of a dormant power in Lizeria. And it seems Lugina is after the same thing.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10303_DESC: At Lodan Frozen Lake, Lugina wrongly assumes that Paris has betrayed the Summoner. Everything is clarified, but Lugina insists on training...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10304_DESC: Paris talks about the social structure of Elgaia while in the Impassable Marshlands. It feels like she distrusts the power of the Summoners' Hall.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10305_DESC: In the Lightning Forest Zaljiba, Paris mentions the dark side of the Summoners' Hall. Lugina is then questioned about it, and he answers accordingly.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10306_DESC: Paris shares her doubts about the gods and talks about the world's instability in Lost City La Veda. She wants to take matters into her own hands.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10307_DESC: Atop the Black Bridge, Lugina says he will crush anyone who gets in his way, and makes one last confession to the Summoner before moving forward.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10308_DESC: Though Lugina loses to the Summoner, he claims that there is no way he could have failed, and continues to deny his own defeat.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10309_DESC: At the Tower of Destruction, an injured Paris still refuses to give up on the dormant power in the region. She won't forgive the Summoner's intrusion.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10310_DESC: A defense system capable of destroying Summoners. However, whatever Paris is looking for, which should've been close, is nowhere to be seen...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10400_DESC: Tilith and the Summoner set off to defeat Zevalhua the Supreme. Unbeknownst to them, Eriole and Paris are on their way to Agni as well...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10401_DESC: In Glomore Hollow, Karl and Seria state they want to help defeat Zevalhua while a mysterious woman scornfully watches from afar.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10402_DESC: After reaching Snow Area Khelne, Disciple Mare suddenly appears and asks Karl to meet her in the Azura Ruins alone to reveal a certain secret to him.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10403_DESC: Seria worries about Karl while wondering in Stokhelna Forest when Mare shows herself again to say that Karl has played right into her hands...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10404_DESC: Seria falls into Mare's trap in the Azura Ruins, and suffers an injury. Tilith leaves Karl's rescue in the Summoner's hands while she cares for Seria.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10405_DESC: Grahdens awaits the Summoner in the Ryvern Mountains and shares his memories of Karl. He says he will get himself captured by Mare to break Karl out.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10406_DESC: Mare shows herself in front of the lone Summoner within the Abyss Cave. Just as she prepares to launch an attack, Tilith returns and prevents it.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10407_DESC: Mare unleashes Granvalm on the Summoner in the White Tower, and escapes. However, Tilith won't let her get away so easily.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10408_DESC: Mare appears once again after having defeated Granvalm, and in the midst of this dire situation, an unforeseen ally saves everyone's hides...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10409_DESC: Lugina saves the Summoner in Ryvern to honor Grahdens's request. He also insists that he was asked to help with Karl's rescue.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10410_DESC: In the Agni Empire, Lugina is very excited about the rescue mission. He claims it's the perfect chance to complete his mission and make fun of Karl.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10411_DESC: Tired of waiting for Mare to make an appearance, Lugina leaves the Summoner in Agniria Coast and goes off to search for Karl on his own...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10412_DESC: Mare finally shows herself at Granasta Plateau. But she is not willing to fight. Instead, she demands that the Summoner follow her to save Karl.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10413_DESC: Mare has flashbacks of a certain person who fought in the war against the gods while the anguished Summoner chases her into Thunder Summit Navara.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10414_DESC: The Summoner advances into the King's Tomb without losing hope of rescuing Karl. Mare cannot understand such obstinacy, leading her to finally strike.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10415_DESC: Just when Mare is about to deal her finishing blow in Lognea Cove, Seria, who was supposed to be gravely injured, jumps in to save the Summoner.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10416_DESC: A horde of enemies appears in Ocean Shrine Albina, leaving Seria and the Summoner in a bind. However, Lugina shows up with a freed Karl just in time.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10417_DESC: Mare is finally defeated by the Summoner, but on a moment's notice, Paris appears to report that Grahdens has been taken captive.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10418_DESC: The Summoner finally sets foot on Mirvana. Tilith explains that this was the setting of the bloodiest battle during the great war with the gods.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10419_DESC: Grahdens has been captured by Zevalhua the Supreme. In order to save him, the Summoner and the others split into groups in the Cave of Darkness.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10420_DESC: In Arvest Snowfield, Paris wonders suspiciously about why the gods have taken Grahdens prisoner instead of just killing him right off the bat...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10421_DESC: While searching for Grahdens in Marleg Ocean of Trees, Paris invites the Summoner to join her cause once again. Tilith ends up interrupting though.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10422_DESC: Lugina chastises Paris in the Bog of Eternal Rain. However, just before things get worse, Seria joins the fun and gets into an argument with Lugina.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10423_DESC: Grahdens's location is confirmed after reaching Cape Narasta, and Paris questions why Lucius doesn't defeat the Four Fallen Gods himself.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10424_DESC: Karl thanks Tilith when she discloses more information on Grahdens in the Mirvana Ruins. Lugina and Seria, however, continue their usual quarrel.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10425_DESC: The whole group has reached the Tower of the Gods at last. Can they accomplish their goal of defeating Zevalhua the Supreme to rescue Grahdens?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10426_DESC: Grahdens shows himself and reveals the secret of Karl's birth. At the same time, Eriole suddenly makes an appearance, cutting in to talk to the elder.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10500_DESC: The Vriksha region is the land under control of the last Fallen God, Beast God Afla Dilith. Tilith reminisces about when she first met the Summoner.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10501_DESC: In the Ulga Lava Cave, Grahdens and Eriole both go after Afla Dilith, announcing that the Summoner will now work hand in hand with the Empire.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10502_DESC: Afla Dilith's disciple, Zurg, suddenly shows himself in Sea Capital Almeria. He confesses to be interested in the Summoner's many recent victories.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10503_DESC: Zurg appears again in the Forest of Old to explain how Lanara was ravaged by a human civil war, and how Afla Dilith alone can truly save the world.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10504_DESC: The Summoner runs into Grahdens at Danrard Fortress. Zurg shows himself as well, explaining how human folly has afflicted this land.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10505_DESC: While in Lanara's Light Ruins, Eriole questions Lucius's motives for helping the human race springing doubts within Tilith.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10506_DESC: Zurg talks about human folly once again in the Cave of Dark Crystals. He then asks the Summoner if the gods who punished the humans were mistaken.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10507_DESC: The group meets Zurg anew in Alnakeid Castle. After slaying the underworld gods there, Zurg will acknowledge the Summoner's power and reveal a truth.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10508_DESC: After defeating the otherworldly gods, Zurg appears and makes the Summoner choose whether to join him, or die. However, an unexpected guest arrives...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10509_DESC: The Summoner heads to Vriksha to hunt down Afla Dilith. Nonetheless, Tilith seems to have taken Zurg's words to heart...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10510_DESC: In Mt. Olmond, Karl makes sure that everyone's on the same page. Everyone says they don't care about what Zurg has to say, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10511_DESC: Zurg shows up in Rownor Beach and demands that the humans to go to Sky Palace Talahr without the goddess Tilith. Only then will he reveal the truth.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10512_DESC: While in the Vriksha Duchy, Tilith asks everyone to decide if they truly want to fight alongside her only after listening to Zurg's spiel first.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10513_DESC: Paris reveals the real intentions of the Imperial Guard at the Red Lake, stating that they are a totally different faction separate from the empire.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10514_DESC: In the Sky Palace Talahr, Zurg tells the true story behind the so-called Four Fallen Gods, and claims that Lucius is the real enemy.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10515_DESC: The Summoner and the others meet up with Tilith in the Dark Castle Damrigia. Every single person says they want to continue fighting beside Tilith.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10516_DESC: The group arrives to Adan's Tower with Tilith. Having witnessed this, Zurg declares them his enemies, and vows to destroy them.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10517_DESC: After Eriole deals a crushing blow to Zurg, he confesses he has been acting under Lucius's instructions, looking for the key to Karna Masta's power.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10518_DESC: As Tilith and the Summoner approach Aldahlia, where the Beast God Afla Dilith awaits, she starts feeling a bit sentimental.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10519_DESC: Once the Summoner learns in Ogurono Desert that Afla Dilith has assimilated a castle, Eriole mentions that his plans include its infiltration as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10520_DESC: Grahdens, who was waiting for Tilith and the Summoner at the Great Temple Eveneze, asks about their plans after the Four Fallen Gods are defeated.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10521_DESC: Karl reminisces in Unarva Forest about the first time the Summoner passed through the gate. However, Seria turns up right in the middle of it all...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10522_DESC: Paris is curious about the Summoner's future plans while in Aldahlia of the Rain. Lugina then makes an appearance, once again chastising her behavior.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10523_DESC: The Dark Figure shows itself in the Pilgrimage Path. It states that it is crucial to know the correct path to take after defeating the Fallen Gods.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10524_DESC: The Summoner must now head towards the castle via La Grenna Deadlands. Everyone trusts that the Summoner can find the real Afla Dilith within it.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10525_DESC: In the Wolf's Lair, Tilith thanks the Summoner for having come this far. She opens a clean path to move forward while she serves as a distraction.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10526_DESC: Everyone rejoices at the defeat of Afla Dilith. However, Eriole and his crew disclose that they plan to plunge the Randall Empire into chaos.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10600_DESC: The Summoner and friends arrive to Atharva with the intention of stopping Eriole's rebellion. Karl seems at a loss on how to change Eriole's mind...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10601_DESC: The Dark Figure makes an appearance at Ghost Town Ornea. He says Eriole can be found in the Crystal Palace, where he is preparing for battle.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10602_DESC: Paris has been expecting everyone at the Great Argant Desert. She warns that she will have to stop them at any cost if they plan to go any further.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10603_DESC: At the Great Argant Desert, Paris tells the Summoners about the world's current disarray. She claims that a strong leader is needed to guide the way.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10604_DESC: Tesla shows herself at Ekmet River. She warns against any interference with Eriole's plans, claiming that the Summoner cannot change the world.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10605_DESC: Grahdens visits the Great Forest Nalmea wondering if the Summoner is prepared to face Eriole. He then proceeds to reveal Eriole and Tesla's sad past.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10606_DESC: The Summoner party tries to pass Mt. Granakia, but Paris shows up leading a troop of knights. A hot battle ensues shortly after...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10607_DESC: Still in Mt. Granakia, Tesla arrives to declare the defeated Paris as useless. Paris is left speechless while Seria and the others try to comfort her.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10608_DESC: After reaching Amuris Cemetery, Paris decides that she must ask Eriole directly about what's happening. She begs the Summoner to lead her to him.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10609_DESC: Once in the Crystal Palace, Eriole reveals that he has no need for nobility in his new utopia. He then flees to the depths of the fortress.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10610_DESC: The Dark Figure arrives to stop Eriole on his tracks. His real identity is revealed, and just when he tries to get rid of everyone, someone appears...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10700_DESC: Following what Tilith had mentioned, the Summoner party visits Bariura. Ark then shows himself to say Lucius awaits in the Grand Gaia Crater.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10701_DESC: Crossing the Ancient Dragon's Wood, the Summoner party begins to consider what they should ask Lucius when they meet. Time is running out.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10702_DESC: Trekking the Boruk Blazing Dunes, the party meets Tilith, who demands they return to Elgaia. As a disciple, she cannot allow them to go any further.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10703_DESC: Tilith breaks down at the Boruk Blazing Dunes, unable to fight against the Summoners. Remembering their travels together, she had tried to stop them.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10704_DESC: Ark hints at the possibility of humanity's destruction at Scarlet River Laorkia. He hopes to test the party's strength at the Tower of the Oracle.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10705_DESC: Revealing that he was once human, the party still doubts Ark. Tilith tries to explain the god-disciple relationship at Deserted Town Yuufim, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10706_DESC: At the Tower of the Oracle, Ark means to test the power of those who serve the gods, versus that of those who oppose them. A brutal battle ensues.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10707_DESC: After fighting at the Tower of the Oracle, Ark explains the true meaning of Summoning. Determined, he challenges the party to meet him at the Capital.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10708_DESC: When meeting Ark at the Imperial Capital, he takes off his mask with determination. He tells of his past, revealing he is against Lucius as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10709_DESC: In Sacred Mt. Bari, the party learns that Lucius is the only one who can control the gate. However, Tilith doesn't seem so sure of this.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10710_DESC: Lucius sends strong minions after the party in the Grand Gaia Crater. Karl and the others will deal with them while the Summoner and Tilith advance.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_10711_DESC: The battle with Lucius is over. However, the calamities that lay within the seal have been unleashed. At that moment, Tilith makes a crucial choice.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11000_DESC: The Summoner begins reconnaissance in Ishgria. Grahdens assigns a new member of Summoners' Hall to help with the mission, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11001_DESC: Grahdens's new aide, who is none other than Paris, meets the Summoner at the Forgotten Ruins. She explains the details of the Ishgria mission.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11002_DESC: The sight of the Lava Bridges brings Paris's mood down when suddenly a demon calling itself Shusui, the War Demon, appears and attacks the party.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11003_DESC: After Shusui realizes that the Summoner's power is not ordinary, he tells the party to head towards the Soaring Tree Tower, past the Lava Bridges.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11004_DESC: At Hogun Acid Cascades, Paris explains why she joined Summoners' Hall. She says she wants to change the Randall Empire from the outside, not inside.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11005_DESC: While in Farv Miasma Forest, Paris discloses that Karl and Seria had left for Ishgria in advance. She also says Lugina was with Seria at the time...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11006_DESC: Grahdens shows up at Thunder Grotto Yuuram after the party faces a setback. Apparently, the First Summoner, Owen, is on his way to Ishgria.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11007_DESC: Paris sheds light on Elgaia's situation while at the Piercing Light Tower. She warns the Summoner not to get manipulated by the Elgaia Federation.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11008_DESC: Paris seems very excited to visit a fabled place as the Poisonous Bug Forest. Apparently, she likes doing studying old legends and myths.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11009_DESC: The Summoner's party finally reaches the Soaring Tree Tower. Shusui says he will be waiting at the top, and sends his minions to slow the group down.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11010_DESC: Claiming he will guide the Summoner, Shusui discloses that there are 8 great demons, including himself. He says the Summoner must face them all.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11100_DESC: Paris and the Summoner have arrived to Lem, the region past Celgrad. Paris seems worried about Karl, Seria, and maybe one other person?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11101_DESC: Grahdens meets the Summoner and Paris at the Jimug Lava Caverns with some bad news. They now must find Seria and Lugina as fast as possible.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11102_DESC: At Baraku Wetlands a goddess by the name of Mora shows herself. Claiming to have been previously sealed by Lucius, she speaks of the demons of Lem.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11103_DESC: While in Vordo Primeval Forest, the Summoner asks Mora about Seria and Lugina's whereabouts. However, there's no word about Karl.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11104_DESC: The great bones of the Fossilized Dragon are scattered everywhere. As the Summoner's party passes through this area, Paris's interest peaks.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11105_DESC: Paris is so curious about the Lem Shrine Ruins, that she decides to go off on her own. However, this isn't very like her...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11106_DESC: At the Lem Shrine Ruins, Mora's attitude changes very suddenly, ultimately attacking the Summoner. But to what end?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11107_DESC: Trapped in the darkness of the Lem Shrine Ruins, the Summoner reunites with Seria and Lugina. But who will come to their rescue?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11108_DESC: While in the Dark Sierra Oritira, neither Seria nor Lugina are very happy to be reunited. Paris explains Mora's charade, and the situation at hand.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11109_DESC: At the Bridge of Despair the party learns that Mora is the demon who rules over Lem. Each member must now work to overcome the demon's traps.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11110_DESC: Ridiculing the Summoners on the Bridge of Despair, Mora discloses some critical information about the demons of Ishgria, and promptly flees.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11200_DESC: Led by Tilith, the Summoner arrives to Beiorg. Paris claims Tilith scolded her for selfishly advancing on her own, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11201_DESC: Though they manage to avert any further danger thanks to Tilith,  Lugina reveals he's not happy about Mora's trickery while at Moldia Lava Road.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11202_DESC: At the Crimson Beach Shurin, the Summoner learns Beiorg is not ruled by a demon, but Mora seems to want the Summoner to eliminate whatever does.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11203_DESC: Within Reis's Lab Ruins, Paris is consumed by curiosity over the documents left behind by the creator of the Six Armors. Lugina seems interested too.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11204_DESC: Moments after entering the Windmill Garden, a loud and strange sound is heard, and the Summoner is suddenly attacked.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11205_DESC: Seria arrives just in time to help the Summoner in the Windmill Garden. Paris and Lugina arrive later with new information for the team.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11206_DESC: While in the Ancient City Maldoor, a deafening sound is heard, and Beiorg attacks the Summoner yet again. However, he seems stronger than before.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11207_DESC: Mora shows up at the Ancient City Maldoor bringing information on Beiorg and Karl. But how do the Summoners react to this?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11208_DESC: Grahdens suddenly appears at the Endless Staircase to tell the Summoner party that Owen seems to be missing. He entrusts Karl to them, and leaves.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11209_DESC: The Summoner party successfully infiltrates Beiorg Castle, and begins searching for the castle's power source. However, an alarm goes off and...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11210_DESC: Karl has somehow made it into Beiorg Castle to deliver the final blow on Beiorg. This stops Beiorg on his tracks, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11300_DESC: Paris mentions the great miasma-emitting flowers of Wulgee while the party heads to the next region. However, they are all still worried about Karl.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11301_DESC: Not only were the injured Seria and Lugina awaiting the Summoner at the Burning Capital Garm, but the First Summoner as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11302_DESC: The Summoner is attacked by Owen at the Burning Capital Garm, and somehow survives. However, Owen isn't through just yet.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11303_DESC: The party continues its search for the demon at the Waste Disposal Lake, all while Lugina and Seria teach Paris just how fearsome Owen can truly be.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11304_DESC: The Summoners spot a strange creature at the Wulgee Flower Bed. Taking it for a demon, they head towards it.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11305_DESC: The enemy escapes from the Wulgee Flower Bed thanks to a rolling boulder. Mora then appears, explaining that the enemy was the former ruler of Wulgee.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11306_DESC: At the Avor Lighting Bridge, the Summoners are scolded by Owen for letting the demon Melord escape, when a mysterious man appears to argue with him.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11307_DESC: The Summoner and Karl meet once again at Melord's old estate, the Forsaken Disciple's Lair. However, Karl disappears just as fast as he showed up.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11308_DESC: The man who wishes to fight Owen shows himself at the Demon Cavern Feig. He seems to resent the Summoners of Old for some reason...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11309_DESC: Grahdens regroups with everyone at the Forsaken Castle Biorad. He seems pleased with the mere fact that Karl seems to be doing well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11310_DESC: The two Summoners of Old show up at the Forsaken Castle Biorad after Melord has been defeated. The eerie man from before follows them there, and...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11400_DESC: Mora shows up with information about the demon who rules this land. Apparently this demon is planning an invasion of Elgaia...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11401_DESC: The Summoners' reunion at the Gadoum Furnace makes for a dull affair thanks to the two Summoners of Old.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11402_DESC: Seria and Lugina get into their usual argument at the Luminous River Falun. However, Owen has no patience for this, so the two youngsters head forth.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11403_DESC: Worried about traps within the Botanical Garden, everyone splits up. Karl then shows up to talk to the Summoner about the Summoners' Hall.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11404_DESC: The eerie man who shows himself before the Summoner at the Gimo Junkyard admits his name is Mirfah, and challenges the Summoner to a duel.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11405_DESC: At the Gimo Junkyard, Mirfah admits that he was once a Summoner, and talks of his past. However, Grahdens promptly appears and...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11406_DESC: Grahdens and Karl see each other at the Shining Capital. They both seem to still trust each other, but are following different paths.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11407_DESC: Mirfah approaches the Summoner once again at the Rakshult Underground. Claiming he speaks the truth, he leaves along with his resent towards the Summoners of Old.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11408_DESC: At the Weather Tower, Mordlim tries to convince the Summoners to join her. They all obviously refuse, and challenge her to a fight.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11409_DESC: After the Summoner beats Mordlim at the Weather Tower, Paris rushes to the scene. However, a strange man from the Federation named Bertz appears...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11500_DESC: Tilith leads the Summoner to a new land known as Zamburg. The ruler of this land, the demon Amu Yunos, awaits there...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11501_DESC: Paris and Seria state that Lugina's whereabouts are unknown at the Bivorg Lava Cave. Given the circumstances, this worries the whole party.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11502_DESC: Mora speaks of the demon that rules this land at the Red Ore Beach. It seems that Seria sensed something from Mora...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11503_DESC: At the Twilight Forest Ruins, Karl opens up about his own goals and the demon heritage that he had kept to himself until now.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11504_DESC: At Thunder Canyon Rahda, Grahdens asks the Summoner's group if they intend to face Karna Masta before revealing the Summoners' Hall's intentions.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11505_DESC: At Despair Castle Kayohn, Grahdens explains why the Summoners' Hall was founded. He says you must defeat Karna Masta to free humanity from the gods.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11506_DESC: Mora tells the full story of sealing Karna Masta at the Great Giant's Remains. Seria asks if she means to interfere with Tilith's rescue.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11507_DESC: In the Tower of Amu Yunos, the demon herself casually challenges the Summoner. She appears to hold the Summoner in contempt, but something feels off.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11508_DESC: In the Tower of Amu Yunos, the demon vanishes, seemingly pleased. Then the Summoner gets caught up in a fight with Owen when Mirfah appears.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11509_DESC: After defeating Owen with the Summoner's help at the Tower of Amu Yunos, Mirfah begins to speak of the land where Karna Masta was sealed.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11600_DESC: The Summoner and friends arrived in Fal Nerga using Tilith's power. However, it seems that something is bothering Paris...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11601_DESC: Paris opens up about her concerns in Fire Dragon's Roar. It seems she is still worried about what she is lacking.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11602_DESC: It seems the one who attacked you in Fire Dragon's Roar was a disciple of the demon ruler of this land. He warns you not to interfere, and vanishes.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11603_DESC: Karl explains what he is trying to accomplish as the son of Barion, the land's demon ruler, to the Summoner and friends at Water Dragonton Treve.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11604_DESC: It seems that Mora has decided her own path after appearing before the Summoner's party and being moved by Seria's words at Ilesia Plains.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11605_DESC: Paris is even more concerned after Seria encourages her at Fort Maharada, and opens up to the Summoner. However, she still seems confused.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11606_DESC: Karl unleashes his powers to face the Summoner and friends at Light Dragonton Sinn. However, it wasn't a full awakening. Maybe he's still uncertain?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11607_DESC: Admitting his doubts, Karl backs down to the Summoner's party at Light Dragonton Sinn. You head to Mt. Nerga together, to decide your next actions.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11608_DESC: Bertz and Lugina appear and explain the risks of reviving Karna Masta at God-Eater's Web. It seems Lugina wants to fight the Summoner, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11609_DESC: Having seen the Summoner's power at God-Eater's Web, Lugina gives up on preventing Karna Masta's revival and resolves to accompany the Summoner.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11610_DESC: Karl attempted to persuade his father at Mt. Nerga, but Barion ignores him and demands he show his power if he is a demon.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11611_DESC: While fighting Barion at Mt. Nerga, Mora appears from nowhere and absorbs its power. And what of the things she said to the group?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11700_DESC: Tilith sent you to the frozen wasteland of Estria, after sensing uncertainty in Mora's power. Seria says she wants to have an honest talk with Mora.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11701_DESC: Mora tells you of Estria at the Oil Platform Adel. After revealing her objective, she said she would wait on the snowy plains and vanished.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11702_DESC: When the Summoners rejected her proposal at the Zig Snowfield, Mora sprung a trap on them and attacked.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11703_DESC: At the Zig Snowfield, Mora tells you she will gather the powers of the demons that sealed Karna Masta and head for the sealed area of Menon.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11704_DESC: The party discusses Mora's strategy at Ice Forest Sulsoria. Having been played by her thus far, you have no choice but to disrupt her plans in the end.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11705_DESC: The party feels they will not be able to avoid fighting Shusui at the Gate of Abdication. Lugina and his group try to stick the Summoner with the job.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11706_DESC: Shusui was covered in injuries when he appeared before the Summoner's party at the Gate of Abdication. Shusui challenges the Summoner by name.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11707_DESC: Defeated, Shusui gave Mora his power at the Gate of Abdication. Just before vanishing, he told the Summoner to seize the position of the strongest.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11708_DESC: Karl worries about controlling his demonic powers in the Shining Cave Navoa. Then Bertz appears to tell the Summoner of Elgaia's current state.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11709_DESC: At the Olaim Ice Ridge, Liomerg declares Karl should be ashamed. Lugina chimes in regarding Karl's psychological weakness, as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11710_DESC: The party listens to Lugina's strategy in the trap-filled halls of the Demon Castle Estria. Everyone begins to carry out their own roles in the plan.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11711_DESC: A trap goes off at the Demon Castle Estria, and Lugina, Paris, and Karl separate to deal with it. Then, when Mora appears...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11712_DESC: Your allies fell at the Demon Castle Estria when Mora unleashed the demonic power she had absorbed, but then Tilith appeared.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11713_DESC: The party is delighted to see Tilith again at the Demon Castle Estria However, Mora reappears, despite having been defeated.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11800_DESC: The Summoner heads to Menon, the land where Karna Masta was sealed, and is determined to face the greatest challenge with their companions.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11801_DESC: As before, Kalon appears before the party at the Sealed Gods' Gate. After confirming the Summoner's intent, he opens the gate, and is gone.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11802_DESC: At Hydra Geyser, Lugina grows dubious of Ark, Bertz, and Liomerg over their lack of action.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11803_DESC: For the sake of his former companions, and to protect the will of his beloved, Ark bars the Summoner's way at Hydra Geyser.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11804_DESC: At Hydra Geyser, Owen and Grahdens appear before the party, badly injured. It seems they challenged Karna Masta, but were forced to flee...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11805_DESC: At the Remains of Raza, Bertz questions what will become of the summoning arts if Karna Masta is defeated. And, Liomerg seems willing to support him.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11806_DESC: Surprised at Ark's defeat, Kalon challenges the Summoner to a duel. If successful, the Summoner will be deemed worthy to challenge Karna Masta.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11807_DESC: At Thunder Hill Padam, Kalon, having confirmed the will of the Summoner's party, begins to explain what became of the Oracle Maiden.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11808_DESC: Finding Ark at Hope's Light Castle, Kalon passes on Ilia's message. But, Ark cannot bear to let his companions' sacrifices go to waste.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11809_DESC: Ark still has not given up on Ilia. To save her, he decides to lend his power to the Summoner's party.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11810_DESC: At the Cursed Town Ygmeon, the party including Ark is joined by Owen and Grahdens. They discuss a possible future without the power of summoning.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11811_DESC: While the party discusses how to defeat the Holy Emperor, many demons, sensing the seal has been broken, rush to Menon.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11812_DESC: To give Ark the time to awaken Ilia's power, it's decided that the Summoner will instead face Karna Masta.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11813_DESC: The Summoner and Ark fight desperately against Karna Masta's overwhelming power to no avail. Just when it looks like this might be the end...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11814_DESC: The power Ilia left behind was fainter than expected. Finding it similar to her own, Tilith tries to amplify Ilia's power.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11815_DESC: The companions have defeated Karna Masta, but Tilith lies mortally wounded from the final attack...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11900_DESC: The Summoners set foot in Mildran, the place where Karna Masta's soul is imprisoned. However, Tilith is confused. She expected a trip to the beach...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11901_DESC: Ark has come to the ruined capital Zera to rescue Ilia. Tilith and the Summoner join him to offer assistance.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11902_DESC: Facing his past weaknesses, Ark looks to the future. With his heart full of warm feelings for his friends, the knight sets forth.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11903_DESC: The party encounters Mora as she recuperates in her home world. The situation seems volatile for a moment, but then takes an unexpected turn...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11904_DESC: Due to a chance meeting in Fuve with those he manipulated as the Dark Figure in the past, Ark is racked with guilt...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11905_DESC: At the sudden appearance of Melord, Ark knows who he will encounter next and decides to fight alone.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11906_DESC: After accepting the Summoner's help, Ark faces the Six Heroes again. Kalon appears to hold back an agitated Melord.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11907_DESC: Ark and the others defeat the Six Heroes. At the same time, both Kalon and Melord fall into a deep sleep.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11908_DESC: With the seal now broken, the Oracle Knight and Shrine Maiden are reunited. Now the final fight with Karna Masta begins...!!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11909_DESC: The Summoner and the others defeat Karna Masta. Ark and Ilia pledge to enjoy their limited time together and depart...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11909_NAME: I Want to Be With You
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11910_DESC: With the battle now over, Ark spends a peaceful time with Ilia. But in his soul he still cannot completely let go of the past...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_11911_DESC: Ark finally leaves his past behind. Ilia embraces him with a smile. The pair then give the Summoner a very special item.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12000_DESC: The Summoner and Tilith receive a message and visit the Summoners' Hall. They decide to head to Bectas, the world where Lugina has vanished.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12001_DESC: Tilith and the Summoner arrive to Bectas. They are tasked with finding Lugina, but Tilith is fascinated by this new world she hasn't seen before.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12002_DESC: In the Iron District, Tilith is amazed by the advanced technology unlike anything in Grand Gaia. Then the two are surrounded by a mysterious enemy.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12003_DESC: The Summoner meets Lugina's subordinate Reda in the Iron District. She says there's no need to search for Lugina, and asks for help surveying Bectas.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12004_DESC: The Summoner gets information on Bectas from Reda in the Selza Arsenal. This world currently has mysterious tremors, and seems headed for collapse.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12005_DESC: The party encounters an automaton on their tail at the Demolished Site. It can understand speech, and wants help rescuing its friend.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12006_DESC: Having rescued an automaton at the Demolished Site, it tells the party about the Information Tower. The party heads there to survey Bectas.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12007_DESC: At Tech City Mersas, the Summoner party became the "masters" the automatons had sought. Reda has given the automatons new names, which are...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12008_DESC: As the party makes its way through Tech City Mersas to get to the Information Tower, a gigantic automaton suddenly appears before them.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12009_DESC: The party drives off the mysterious automaton that attacked at Tech City Mersas. Then, for some reason, a glimmer of the power of Summoning returns...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12010_DESC: Tilith presses buttons in the Information Tower, and the machines play someone's conversation. Hearing this, Reda becomes focused on the controls...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12011_DESC: The party encounters Bertz in the Zoldas Mountains. Reda seems frightened of him, and the party hurries to stay ahead of the Abel Faction.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12012_DESC: The party advances through the Elevated Station to the facility the tremors are coming from. But then the mysterious automaton from Mersas reappears.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12013_DESC: At the Elevated Station, the party is nearly overwhelmed by the mysterious automaton's power until a man bursts through a wall. That man is...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12014_DESC: After its defeat at the Elevated Station, the Divine Machine quickly revives and withdraws. Lugina explains about the machine and situation.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12015_DESC: Reda and the others investigate a building they discovered: Michele's Sepulcher. According to Hatch and Tull, their old master's legacy is here.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12016_DESC: The seemingly-defensive automatons are driven off at Michele's Sepulcher. Then, someone's voice can be heard, haltingly, from the altar...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12100_DESC: The Summoner and the others arrive in Vilanciel, a world where a sealed god has recently been spotted. It is a world of snow and ice...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12101_DESC: At Bariura Lake Castle, the Summoner and the others have been tasked with surveying this world by Lugina. They start with the looming castle...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12102_DESC: In Bariura Lake Castle, the group encounters an old woman and her granddaughter, who are descended from royalty. They ask about this world, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12103_DESC: On the Castle Road, it seems the tale of the Bariura Empire is viewed as a myth here. Only Liana's older sister Luciana believes it.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12104_DESC: The Summoner and friends meet Luciana, Liana's elder sister, at Snowstorm Woods. Tilith tries to be friendly, but Luciana vehemently rejects her.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12105_DESC: Apparently, to head for the Mystical Wolf from Snowstorm Woods, the party must perform rituals at two shrines ahead. Reda suggests splitting up.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12106_DESC: Liana admits her fear of the gods at Raujis Lake. Tilith explains her own concerns over the relationship between gods and humans to her.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12107_DESC: Luciana expresses her distrust of gods at the Mirage Snowfields. Reda tells her of the history of Grand Gaia and Elgaia.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12108_DESC: The sisters are reunited at Subzero Road, but find themselves on opposite sides. Then a giant wolf that may be involved with the sealed god appears!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12109_DESC: The Mystical Wolf suddenly enters the fray at Subzero Road. Its words imply that it is the sealed god itself, but something doesn't seem right...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12110_DESC: The Summoner and party encounter a young girl at Gallum Ice Ridge. As soon as she sees them, she attacks without a word...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12111_DESC: A man stops the fight with the girl at Gallum Ice Ridge. Reda says his group is an elite Abel Faction cadre, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12112_DESC: The party reaches the Mystical Wolf's Lair. Tilith speaks to Liana, concerned by her fear of facing the Mystical Wolf.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12113_DESC: Liana calls out to the Mystical Wolf at Mystical Wolf's Lair, but receives no response. Luciana's group gets into trouble. Then, their salvation...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12114_DESC: After a fierce battle at Mystical Wolf's Lair, the Divine Wolf returns to normal. It gives the Summoner information, speaks to Liana, and leaves.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12115_DESC: Nere calls the party to the Divine Beast's Prison beneath Bariura Lake Castle and asks them to slay the demonic beast sealed there.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12116_DESC: Nere tells of the Bariura Empire's final battle at the Divine Beast's Prison, and the party receives an imperial scythe for slaying the beast.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12117_DESC: At Merciful Glory, the Divine Wolf welcomes the Summoner's party to a holy site only it knows of, then gratefully asks to battle with its true power.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12118_DESC: The Divine Wolf acknowledges the Summoner's power at Merciful Glory and anticipates the future as it returns to its role as the world's protector.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12200_DESC: The Summoner visits a new world called Ohbanahara to search for a sealed god. Amazingly, Seria, who has finished her training, meets you there.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12201_DESC: The Summoner and Seria meet up with Tilith at Bluesun Grove Path. Reda has headed off for some other world, while Hatch and Tull are helping Noel.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12202_DESC: The Summoner's party finds a group of people dressed in black attacking a woman at Bluesun Grove Path, and soon find themselves under attack as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12203_DESC: The woman the Summoner's party rescued at Bluesun Grove Path is named Suzune. For now, they decide to head somewhere safe with her.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12204_DESC: The Summoner's group meets Suzune's retainer, Sakunoshin, at Prosperity Fields. But then Kagenui appears and attacks Suzune, leading to a battle!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12205_DESC: Having driven off Kagenui at Prosperity Fields, the group learns of Suzune's true identity and situation. They decide to help her.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12206_DESC: Suzune seems horrified by the misery that remains after a battle at Calamity Plains. But there's also a man there, playing a requiem on a flute...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12207_DESC: The group tried to slip by the lax security at the Defensive Checkpoint, but Genba was waiting with minions. Unable to flee, the group fights back.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12208_DESC: Suzune is taken hostage and the Summoner's party is captured at the Defensive Checkpoint. Then unexpected help arrives just when all hope seems lost!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12209_DESC: Genba's mysterious swordswoman Raka appears at the Grand Bridge as the Summoner and friends head for the castle. Why does she know of the sealed gods?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12210_DESC: The Summoner's party is overwhelmed by a mysterious power at the Grand Bridge. She tells them the object of their search is close by, then leaves.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12211_DESC: Having made it into the castle at Skyblock Walls, the Summoner and friends are attacked by Kagenui. Genba has left him in charge of security.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12212_DESC: The Summoner's group struggles to get past Kagenui at Skyblock Walls. Then the mysterious man reappears, drawing Kagenui's attention.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12213_DESC: The Summoner's party finally reaches Suzune in the Thousand-Mat Hall. Now they face their pursuer, Kagenui, alongside a battle-ready Genba!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12214_DESC: Channeling the Divine Phoenix and controlling Genba, Raka restrains the Summoner's party in the Thousand-Mat Hall. Amazingly, they're freed by...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12215_DESC: The Summoner, Seria, and Sakunoshin leave Suzune to Tilith and head for the rooftops of the Phoenix Tower. They're after Raka, seeking a final battle.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12216_DESC: Sakunoshin's mistake leaves Seria immobilized at the Phoenix Tower. The Summoner heads after Raka for a one-on-one showdown with a sealed god.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12217_DESC: Following her defeat, Raka tells the Summoner that the Divine Phoenix within her is the ruler of chaos and destruction, and then it manifests.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12218_DESC: The Summoner successfully defeats the Divine Phoenix at the Phoenix Tower. Meanwhile, Genba wishes for death and Suzune exercises her noble rights.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12219_DESC: The Summoner's group heads to investigate the Abandoned Temple, where monsters are rumored to dwell. Sakunoshin tells tales of the temple, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12220_DESC: The monsters in the Abandoned Temple were really automatons, and the Summoner's party shut them off. Kagenui claims the other story was a ruse, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12221_DESC: Myoukei has called the party to the Fields of Despair. Suzune's former tutor and a master of ninjutsu, he wants to test himself against the Summoner.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_12222_DESC: Having defeated Myoukei at the Fields of Despair, the Summoner receives a wondrous and masterfully crafted blade.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21000_DESC: The Summoner meets Shusui in the depths of the Cave of Sealed Might. The demon claims to have been disturbed while sleeping, and attacks.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21001_DESC: The Shusui the Summoner defeats in the Cave of Sealed Might turns out to be a "Shadow." The Shadow explains that a certain seal has begun to break.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21002_DESC: In Lem's Cape of Sealed Ploys, the Summoner meets Mora once again. She immediately starts a fight, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21003_DESC: The Mora the Summoner defeats at the Cape of Sealed Ploys turns out to be another "Shadow." What could she mean by an "obstructive power"?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21004_DESC: Mora talks about the real demon named Beiorg in the Sealed Forest. How will things change after defeating these demonic Shadows?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21005_DESC: Apparently, what the Six Armors were really protecting was the Sealed Forest. What will happen if more of these Shadows are defeated?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21006_DESC: Melord lies within the Sealed Ship Graveyard in his original shape, before he turned into a demon. He seems worthy of the title of "disciple."
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21007_DESC: The Melord in the Sealed Ship Graveyard was yet another Shadow. The Summoner finds out that he had been abandoned in this land for some reason...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21008_DESC: The Summoner encounters Mordlim yet again in the Sealed Empty Garden hidden behind the Botanical Garden.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21009_DESC: Mordlim is defeated anew at the Sealed Empty Garden, but leaves some disturbing words behind before disappearing for good.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21010_DESC: In the Sealed Crystal Cave, it was not Amu Yunos's Shadow who awaited you as you expected. The demon identifies himself as Kalon instead, and attacks.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21011_DESC: When the Summoner defeats Amu Yunos's Shadow as it replaces Kalon in the Sealed Crystal Cave, Mirfah appears and wants to test his strength.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21012_DESC: Mirfah seemed both frustrated and pleased at losing to the Summoner in the Sealed Crystal Cave. He asked for a rematch sometime, and then departed.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21013_DESC: The keystone of Karna Masta's seal, the demon Kalon's shadow sees Lugina's and the Summoner's power and agrees to fight at Sealed Dragon's Deep.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21014_DESC: Paris appears as the Summoner speaks with Lugina at Sealed Dragon's Deep. Paris wants to fight the Summoner to overcome her doubts.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21015_DESC: It seems the fight with the Summoner at Sealed Dragon's Deep has dispelled Paris's doubts. She says she will travel with the Summoner from now on.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21016_DESC: A quiet Seria awaits the Summoner at the Sealed Altar looking for a fight.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21017_DESC: Karl appears right after Seria while still at the Sealed Altar. It appears he wants to challenge Barion to finally settle his lingering doubts.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21018_DESC: At the Sealed Altar, Karl questions who he is. After he gives an answer true to himself, he finally learns how to control his latent demonic power.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21019_DESC: As the Summoner searches for a way to restore Ilia, Kalon's shadow warns that the task is impossible. But the Summoner won't quit without a fight.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_21020_DESC: Before vanishing, Kalon's shadow tells that the seal on Karna Masta's power is completely broken, and Karna Masta's power has been revived in Mildran.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_30023_DESC: Having reached the rank of Darkstalker, the Summoner and Seria have a chat. However, Karl shows up to talk about the first time he met Seria and...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_30024_DESC: The Summoner tells Karl about reaching the rank of Ouranos, while Karl tries to tell the story of how he met Seria again. However, Seria interrupts...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_30025_DESC: Karl tells the Summoner, who has just been promoted to the Phoebus rank, of his first impression of Seria, but she manages to interfere yet again.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_30026_DESC: The Summoner reaches the rank of Athena, and Seria opens up about how she met Karl. Now the reason she tried to avoid this talk becomes apparent...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_40021_DESC: Demons keep appearing from another world. Noah asks for the Summoner's help in defeating the demons' leader, Arkem.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_40022_DESC: The Summoners manage to beat Arkem. However, Noah realizes how much power he truly lacks after watching Owen on the battlefield.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50000_DESC: The Grand Quest System has been completed! Lin seems very excited for this new Summoner support tool, explaining the great points about the system.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50001_DESC: Noah and Rhynt add a new function to the Grand Quest System. Now one can experience things from the time of the great war with the gods...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50101_DESC: Karl asks the Summoner for help with defeating a dragon. However, apparently the beast is quick to flee from danger.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50102_DESC: The Summoners split up to go after the dragon. According to Karl, it couldn't have gone too far.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50103_DESC: After Karl suspects that the tremor happening means the Summoner drove away the dragon, his resolve towards the mission strengthens.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50104_DESC: Suspecting that the Summoner has fought away the dragon, Karl rejoices believing that now's their chance to corner it.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50105_DESC: Seria has been chasing after the Summoner and Karl. After scolding the Summoner for "moving too slow," she decides to go ahead and slay the dragon.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50106_DESC: The Summoner receives a message from Lin saying that Karl will be a little late to reach the rendezvous point at the Tower of Dark Clouds.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50107_DESC: Karl opens a treasure chest. Apparently there are many treasures still left in these parts after the great war with the gods.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50108_DESC: Karl advances on his own and faces the dragon. The dragon flees as expected, but doesn't get very far.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50109_DESC: Karl chases the dragon after the Summoner has confronted it, but there are too many possibilities as to where it could've gone.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50110_DESC: Karl finds the dragon's resting place, and blocks its entrance. The branches on the ground suggest its real nest may be in the Thunder Valley.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50111_DESC: Karl runs into the dragon unexpectedly. He tries to chase after the escaping dragon, but he's suddenly attacked from out of nowhere...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50112_DESC: Seria injures herself during a heated battle against the dragon. She tells the Summoner to stand back, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50113_DESC: The Summoner decides that Seria's medical care takes priority over chasing after the dragon. Karl proposes they consider the mission complete for now.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50114_DESC: Seria and the Summoner challenge the dragon. However, Karl is injured and cannot chase after the beast, so he proposes they report back for now.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50115_DESC: Seria and the Summoner lose the dragon just when it was almost beaten. However, they receive some important information from Karl via Lin.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50116_DESC: Just when the dragon is about to roar, Karl lands a finishing blow. Now that the mission has been completed, they head back home, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50200_DESC: Lugina unexpectedly shows up and asks the Summoner to take on a mission together. They are to find the empress's hidden treasure.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50201_DESC: The Summoner and Lugina split up and each take a different route towards the Great Tree of Life, while Paris follows a third route there.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50202_DESC: Lin has some information about the empress for the Summoner. According to what is known about her today, she was a cold-blooded monarch...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50203_DESC: The Summoner finds a treasure chest. A sound of what resembles the flick of a switch is heard, but nothing really happens...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50204_DESC: After defeating a tough enemy, the Summoner finds a treasure chest. Inside is a stone fragment of some kind...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50205_DESC: As Lugina continues on his path, he remembers that the empress's sorcerer was her closest confidant, almost like her brother. Maybe he made these...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50206_DESC: After Lugina opens a treasure chest, a resounding rumble can be heard, as if something gigantic were in motion.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50207_DESC: Lugina finds a cave blocked by an iron barred gate. At that very moment, paralyzing gas is released and the gate opens.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50208_DESC: After defeating a tough enemy, Lugina finds a treasure chest. The only thing inside is a stone fragment, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50209_DESC: As Paris reaches the Town in Ruins, she remembers a story that tells of the fearsome empress's nature.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50210_DESC: Paris opens a treasure chest adorned with a three-headed dragon. What sounds like a switch being activated is heard, but nothing happens...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50211_DESC: Paris finds a treasure chest with its seal already broken. Her guess is that Summoners' Hall has sent personnel to search for the treasure as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50212_DESC: Paris manages to defeat a tough enemy, and earns the treasure chest guarded by the beast as her reward. Inside she finds a stone fragment of sorts.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50213_DESC: The Summoner finally reaches the Great Tree of Life. There is no treasure to be found here, but words start appearing on the trunk of the Tree...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50214_DESC: Lugina finally reaches the Great Tree of Life. There is no treasure to be found here, but words start appearing on the trunk of the Tree...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50215_DESC: Paris finally reaches the Great Tree of Life. There is no treasure to be found here, but words start appearing on the trunk of the Tree...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50216_DESC: The Summoner, Lugina, and Paris finally reach the Great Tree of Life. The three of them have brought their stone fragments, so the last trial begins.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50217_DESC: The party manages to clear the last trial. However, the treasure hidden by the empress doesn't turn out to be what they were expecting...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50300_DESC: Karl and Seria receive some intel about the demon Graham's whereabouts and ask the Summoner for help. Seria doesn't think it'll help much though.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50301_DESC: The three Summoners approach Graham's location via separate routes. Seria states once again that the Summoner's help is unnecessary.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50302_DESC: Graham approaches the Summoner in a courteous manner, and decides to test the Summoner's power after deeming the same an interesting enough opponent.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50303_DESC: Whether he really means it or not, Graham claims the Summoner to be too much for him, and flees. He says there's someone else he wants to play with...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50304_DESC: Graham scolds Karl for being late, and attacks him. Karl accepts Graham's challenge, though weary of his traps.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50305_DESC: Graham congratulates Karl on his growth, as if mocking him, and quickly flees. Even if this is a trap, Karl is set on going after him.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50306_DESC: Seria attacks Graham to avenge the comrades she's lost to his tricks. Graham says he knows nothing of it, claiming he usually kills countless humans.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50307_DESC: Graham doesn't take Seria seriously, and leaves because he's supposedly bored. He challenges Seria to come after him.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50308_DESC: The Summoners manage to corner Graham, but it all works in accordance to his plans. The party then falls straight into his trap...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50309_DESC: The Summoner and Seria are blasted off to separate locations full of powerful monsters. They try to go after Graham while Grahdens finds Karl's lance.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50310_DESC: Graham, who's supposed to be waiting at the Coliseum Ruins, suddenly appears. The Summoner is able to somehow repel his sneak attack, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50311_DESC: Graham shows himself to a grumbling Seria. He proceeds to tell her he loves her, but his definition of love is quite the twisted one...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50312_DESC: As Grahdens looks for Karl, Graham appears before him. Graham tries to provoke the Elder Summoner, but Grahdens counters by provoking him instead.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50313_DESC: Grahdens helps the unconscious Karl. He teaches Karl about the true meaning behind trusting someone, and leaves the rest up to the young Summoner.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50314_DESC: Karl makes his way to the Coliseum Ruins, where Graham awaits. However, he feels like something within him has to come to life all of the sudden...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50315_DESC: The Summoner arrives to the Coliseum Ruins. Graham, who has been waiting, says he will get more serious now, and attacks suddenly.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50316_DESC: Graham has supposedly been driven into a corner, but he manages to heal all his wounds in an instant and flees, leaving a terrible aura behind...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50317_DESC: Seria arrives to the Coliseum Ruins. After Graham mocks her, he says he will be a bit harsher on her than usual...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50318_DESC: Though Graham is supposedly cornered, he heals all his wounds in an instant. Seria tries to take him on again, but he manages to escape.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50319_DESC: After Karl arrives to Graham's lair he waits for his comrades before making a move, believing they are already on their way to help him.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50320_DESC: Graham is surprised that the Summoner, Karl, and Seria were all able to arrive at the same time. Claiming he won't go easy on them, he attacks!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50321_DESC: Graham heals his own wounds, but Karl sees through his facade. The attacks they landed on Graham were indeed successful.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50322_DESC: The Summoners defeat Graham, but it seems like the demon knew of Karl's origins. Sensing a presence, Karl moves on his own.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50323_DESC: Karl follows the presence he felt and finds that Graham has survived somehow. The demon shows his true nature and comes after Karl!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50324_DESC: Graham is defeated without revealing what he knows about Karl. As Karl leaves the area still clouded by doubt, Seria and the Summoner show up.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50400_DESC: The Summoner receives an urgent call from Lin. She says that Seria has run off after the demon Algmos all by herself after having heard of a sighting.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50401_DESC: After Lin discloses the location of the demon, she mentions that she has asked other Summoners to help out as well, so the Summoner should seek them.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50402_DESC: The Summoner runs into Tilith by chance. After Tilith hears what Seria has done, she immediately agrees to go after her together.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50403_DESC: The Summoner runs into Grahdens by coincidence. Grahdens tells of Seria's ties with the demon, and agrees to go after her with the Summoner.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50404_DESC: The Summoner runs into Lugina. After Lugina mocks Seria's course of action, he agrees to go after her to make fun of her in person.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50405_DESC: Tilith and the Summoner find Seria, who is confronting Algmos. Seria is bent on facing the demon alone, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50406_DESC: Seria confronts Algmos. Grahdens and the Summoner ignore Seria's wish of fighting alone, and join the battle.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50407_DESC: Lugina and the Summoner arrive just when Seria is about to confront Algmos, and join the fight without anyone asking them to.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50408_DESC: As Tilith guards Seria from harm, she reminds her that there are people who worry about her now, in the present.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50409_DESC: Algmos gets away. While Seria dwells in her past Grahdens advises her to embrace her pain, and to bear the responsibility of her burden.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50410_DESC: Algmos escapes while Seria and Lugina argue. Seria is stumped by Lugina's sound reasoning, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50411_DESC: Though worried about Tilith's physical state, Seria finally makes up her mind and asks the Summoner for help once again.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50412_DESC: Persuaded by Grahdens's advice Seria decides to face Algmos not in order to gain retribution, but to finally let go of her past.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50413_DESC: Without giving it a second thought, Seria declares that she's going after Algmos and asks Lugina for his help with the dangerous task.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50414_DESC: Seria defeats Algmos and grows greatly as a person after pondering the meaning of Tilith's heartfelt message.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50415_DESC: After defeating Algmos with Grahdens's help, Seria declares that she will no longer fear placing her trust in others.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50416_DESC: Having defeated Algmos, Seria gives Lugina all the credit, and even thanks him for his assistance. When Lugina is subjected to this, he...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50500_DESC: Grahdens speaks to the Summoner in the Imperial Capital Randall. Without giving away too many details, he asks the Summoner for help with something.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50501_DESC: Grahdens's real purpose is to defeat the demon Mashreed, but before he can do that, the number of surrounding demons in the area must be contained.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50502_DESC: Grahdens defeats a demon in the Windswept Town. He states that the fight hardly qualified as a warm up, as if his opponent had been a breeze.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50503_DESC: Grahdens defeats a demon in the Inferno Forest. He states that the fight hardly qualified as a warm up, as if his opponent had been a breeze.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50504_DESC: Grahdens defeats a demon in the Halcyon Plains. He states that the fight hardly qualified as a warm up, as if his opponent had been a breeze.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50505_DESC: Grahdens defeats a demon in the Stormswept Metropolis. He states that the fight hardly qualified as a warm up, as if his opponent had been a breeze.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50506_DESC: Grahdens's fighting instinct slowly returns to him. He can sense Mashreed's strong presence, and yet another powerful one in the area.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50507_DESC: The Summoner defeats a demon in the Shadow Temple. Grahdens, who was lagging behind, states he needs more time to recover his fighting instinct.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50508_DESC: Grahdens encounters an unexpectedly strong opponent. However, he deems it the perfect opponent to fully restore his fighting instinct.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50509_DESC: The battle has ended and Grahdens has regained his pride as a Summoner. He vows to fight in the frontlines from now on as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50510_DESC: The Summoner and Grahdens finally meet Mashreed. Grahdens challenges the demon to see if its strength truly lives up to its reputation.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50511_DESC: Mashreed runs from Grahdens in the heat of battle. Grahdens is highly disappointed, but decides to go after it just in case...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50512_DESC: Mashreed has changed its shape, becoming more intimidating than ever. Knowing the real fight is about to begin, Grahdens's fighting spirit swells.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50513_DESC: Grahdens defeats Mashreed and encourages the Summoner, who is astonished by the power the Elder Summoner displayed, to head towards Ishgria.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50600_DESC: Lin asks the Summoner to accompany her during a land survey in Elgaia. She says if the Summoner is around, she will have nothing to worry about.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50601_DESC: Lin states that they must explore four areas to complete the survey, and that if she becomes unable to continue, the survey will be deemed a failure.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50602_DESC: Lin's clothes are melted by the mucus secreted by a certain demon. Seeing herself in a pinch, she asks the Summoner for help.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50603_DESC: Lin is rendered unable to move by what seem like tentacles tangled around her feet. The Summoner manages to rescue her, but now she's soaking wet...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50604_DESC: A demon with a beak starts tearing Lin's clothes apart. The Summoner manages to defeat the demon, but ends up in rags worse than Lin's.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50605_DESC: Lin inspects the setting of the last survey area. The party is surrounded by demons in a flash, though they're excited to bring the survey to its end.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50606_DESC: The Summoner continues battling all surrounding demons, until the last one of them lands a desperate final attack...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50607_DESC: A few days after Lin's survey comes to its end, the Summoner faces a lot of intriguing cold stares back in the Imperial Capital...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50700_DESC: Paris dreams of her early childhood as she dozes off in the Imperial Library. Meanwhile, Noel suddenly appears...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50701_DESC: Paris heads towards the Temple of Illusions and runs into the Summoner, who says is in the area on an urgent mission from Summoners' Hall.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50702_DESC: As the Summoner approaches the Temple of Illusions, a blinding light suddenly appears, somehow bringing with it the once defeated disciple Zebra.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50703_DESC: The Summoner defeats Zebra once again. Lin says she thinks his appearance could be connected to the demon dwelling within the Temple of Illusions.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50704_DESC: The disciple Mare shows herself anew before the Summoner. Wielding powers greater than those of a god, she asks about the Summoner's destination.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50705_DESC: Mare is defeated by the Summoner once more. As she laughs, she predicts that the Summoner will one day be destroyed by powerless beings.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50706_DESC: The disciple Zurg also shows himself, just as Mare had. He says that humans have no hope of governing Grand Gaia.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50707_DESC: After the Summoner defeats Zurg, Lin discloses that the power of the demon awaiting in the temple may be that of manifesting one's fears.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50708_DESC: The Summoner finally reaches the Temple of Illusions, but just when four strong presences are sensed in the area, communication with Lin goes awry...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50709_DESC: The Summoner ends up defeating the Four Fallen Gods instead of the demon. The real demon gets away, but the mission is considered clear for now.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50710_DESC: Eriole suddenly shows himself before Paris. He chastises her and challenges her to a battle she doesn't want to fight.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50711_DESC: The Eriole Paris had been fighting suddenly disappears. Without even considering that it was all an illusion, Paris goes forth amidst the confusion.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50712_DESC: Tesla appears before Paris. Berating her for having been born a noble, Tesla brands Paris her enemy, as well as Eriole's.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50713_DESC: Just like Eriole, Tesla also disappears. Without comprehending what is going on around her, Paris continues heading towards the temple.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50714_DESC: Eriole appears once more and tries to persuade Paris to join him anew. However, he is suddenly attacked by a mysterious light...
