entries.MST_SCENARIO_50715_DESC: Eriole explains to Paris the type of world he wants to build. However, it is then that Paris remembers the words of her dear childhood friend...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50716_DESC: After seeing Eriole transform, Paris finally realizes her enemies have been illusions. Now she is more determined to move forth than ever before!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50717_DESC: Paris destroys the demon behind all the illusions, and vows to live her life by helping those who are in need of her power.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50718_DESC: Paris finally learns her new purpose after defeating Eriole. However, there is a strong presence emanating from the Temple of Illusions...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50719_DESC: After Paris regroups with the Summoner, Lin explains the characteristics of the demon. They head towards the temple to defeat it, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50720_DESC: With the demon defeated, Paris confesses to the Summoner that it may be good for her to start seeing things from different points of view.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50721_DESC: After fighting against the illusions, Paris rediscovers the doubt within her. However, she feels that these doubts are what led her there.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50722_DESC: Paris is not surprised in the least to learn she had been fighting against illusions. Instead, she focuses on a way to make her own dreams a reality.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50800_DESC: Noel and Rhynt talk about powering up their new mock Units, but they somehow need Lugina to battle a demon with very particular powers to do so.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50801_DESC: The Summoner goes after the demon alongside Lugina. Karl also happens to be in the area fulfilling an urgent request from Grahdens.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50802_DESC: Lugina runs into an opponent who looks exactly like him. As the fake Lugina provokes the real one, a battle ensues.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50803_DESC: The fake Lugina says he's the real deal in both mind and spirit. However, the real Lugina has yet to simmer down, and immediately attacks the fake.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50804_DESC: As the fake Lugina tries to provoke the original, Lugina fires back with taunts of his own. The anger each of them feels fuels yet another brawl.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50805_DESC: The fake Lugina is defeated by the real Lugina. He flees saying that he wants to learn to control his current body and spirit more efficiently.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50806_DESC: Lin informs the Summoner about the target demon. She says it's possible that it has taken on Lugina's shape.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50807_DESC: Karl heads towards the Abandoned Metropolis alone. Hearing that other personnel has been dispatched to the area, he gets a hunch as to who it is.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50808_DESC: Caught in a mad frenzy, the fake Lugina shows his true demonic nature. Lugina, who is also burning with rage, triggers a fight.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50809_DESC: Karl and the Summoner are confused by Lugina's fake. However, after the real Lugina insults them they realize who's the original and fight together.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50810_DESC: Lugina defeats the demon Nebulous, and instead of this victory humbling him, it gives his personality a turn for the worse...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50811_DESC: The Summoner is suddenly attacked by Lugina upon arriving to the Abandoned Metropolis, but can immediately tell this opponent is a fake.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50812_DESC: Upon arriving to his destination, Karl runs into Lugina's fake. Unprovoked by the impostor, he accepts the challenge while keeping his cool.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50813_DESC: Noel and Rhynt, who concocted the plan to have Lugina fight Nebulous, are confused as to why Karl was in the area.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50814_DESC: After Karl repels the fake Lugina's attack, he wonders why Grahdens has sent him on this mission, and waits for the real Lugina's arrival.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50815_DESC: Lugina goes after the demon with Karl. Awaiting them, the demon mentions an incident involving Zagamlung, and Karl intervenes on Lugina's behalf.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50816_DESC: Lugina gets angry at Karl for unwantedly sticking up for him and challenges him to a duel. Karl can see that Lugina is serious, so he accepts.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50817_DESC: Lugina claims Karl is no match for him after Karl is seemingly unable to fight to the best of his ability. But according to Karl...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50900_DESC: Edea, princess of Palmyna, makes a stand against the invasion of the gods and gathers Lorand, Dean, and Loch to fight for her cause.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50901_DESC: Lorand explains his battle plans to the Royal Army. Edea, who had persuaded him to join her, gives a great morale boosting speech to her soldiers.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50902_DESC: Edea regroups with Loch, who had gone ahead, but it seems that Dean has gone even further ahead. As always, Loch and Dean's animosity surfaces...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50903_DESC: Edea regroups with Dean, and Loch picks a fight with Dean for having advanced without permission. Lorand tries to set them straight, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50904_DESC: The group confirms that a large number of God Army troops guards the way to the God Army Palace. Placing her faith on her soldiers, Edea waits.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50905_DESC: Declaring he can't even stand the sight of humans when the Royal Army appears before him, an enraged Zebra attacks.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50906_DESC: Zebra deduces the plans of the Palmyna Army. He believes it would be entertaining to see the humans despair after witnessing Cardes's power.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50907_DESC: Edea learns that the Royal Army has successfully attacked the God Army. She encourages everyone to do their best, while concerned for their safety.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50908_DESC: The God Army moves and clears a path to the palace. Edea thanks everyone before the final battle, but Loch claims it is much too early to do so.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50909_DESC: Edea and her comrades face Cardes. The Fallen God's intimidating atmosphere brings everyone down, but Edea's words fill them with hope anew.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_50910_DESC: Loch's finishing blow opens a gate to the Spirit World. In order to ensure that her friends escape safely, Edea sacrifices herself to seal Cardes...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51000_DESC: Loch blames himself for not being able to protect Edea. However, Lafdranya's light shows him that Edea's heart is still beating.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51001_DESC: Loch heads towards Obselion Castle to confirm his suspicions, hoping that both Lorand and Dean are on their way there as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51002_DESC: Surprised to see the Royal Army has survived, Loch tries to lead it without any experience and asks the soldiers to create a diversion to save Edea.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51003_DESC: Zebra is furious to see the Royal Army appear before him once again. Claiming it wouldn't be a bad idea to reduce their numbers, he attacks.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51004_DESC: Zebra starts acting strange amidst the fierce battle. As if feeling a change in Cardes's state, he flees to his master's side immediately.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51005_DESC: Loch finds Dean. As he states he must be the one to save the princess, Dean asks him when he plans to confess his love for Edea...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51006_DESC: Lorand's hate towards the God Army has driven him mad with fury within the walls of the ruined Arlind Seminary. Loch and Dean try to reason with him.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51007_DESC: Lorand returns to his old self, but refuses to join Loch and Dean. However, he changes his mind as soon as he senses Edea's heartbeat.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51008_DESC: Loch and the others enter the Spirit World and meet Cardes. They also see Edea, who lies dormant after sealing Cardes away.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51009_DESC: Hearing her friends calling out to her, Edea awakens. However, the seal on Cardes breaks, causing him to lose control over his powers...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51010_DESC: Edea decides to give her own life to seal Cardes away for good, and Loch and the rest insist on giving their own lives to help her with the task.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51011_DESC: In a desperate effort Lafdranya surpasses its own limits, exhibiting unfathomable power. The Four Heroes launch their final attack to defeat Cardes!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51100_DESC: Michele meets Duel-GX, a strange dark object that fell from the sky. Dubbing it "Crabby," Michele takes Duel-GX to her estate.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51101_DESC: Lodin burns with rage towards Melchio. Michele hears the details concerning Melchio from Duel-GX, and decides to finish him herself.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51101_NAME: I Get It, More or Less
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51102_DESC: Michele decides to face Melchio alongside Duel-GX. The dark machine tries its best to stop Michele, but she will have none of it...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51103_DESC: Michele decides to face Melchio alone. Duel-GX tries to stop her, but she refuses to listen and sets off on her own.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51104_DESC: Michele meets Tiara and tries to take her along to defeat Melchio. However, with a prior commitment to the people of her village, Tiara refuses...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51105_DESC: After scolding Tiara for belittling her own self, Michele proposes they become friends. Surprised, Tiara accepts her proposal...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51106_DESC: Disappointed by Tiara's constant belittling of her own self, Michele feels that Tiara has let her down, and takes off...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51107_DESC: Zelban appears in pursuit of a dragon. However, Michele has already fought said dragon, and the two begin an argument that turns into a battle...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51108_DESC: Zelban decides to fight against Melchio. He says he will do so alone, but that he will not stop Michele and her friends if they choose to come along.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51109_DESC: Michele invites Zelban to join her party, but is quickly upset by his half-hearted attitude. She decides to end their exchange there and then.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51110_DESC: Lodin reaches Melchio's location aching for a fight. On the other hand, Melchio, who is on auto-mode, labels him an enemy and counterattacks.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51111_DESC: Thanks to Lodin's attacks, Melchio is finally rendered immobile. Excited for his victory Lodin takes his leave, but afterwards...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51112_DESC: Melchio continues his rampage like nothing happened after being attacked by Lodin. This makes Lodin realize the disadvantages of fighting alone...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51113_DESC: Lodin shows up just when Michele mentions Melchio. However, when he says that he'll be gracious enough to lend her a hand...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51114_DESC: Lodin crushes a beast. Still yearning for a fight with Melchio, he insists to Michele that he is not a loser.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51115_DESC: Lodin crushes a beast and says he's still willing to help, but Michele declines because she wants to fulfill her goal with people she actually likes.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51116_DESC: Michele finally finds Melchio. Mistakenly assuming she's being ignored, she decides to pick a fight by doing things that cannot be overlooked.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51117_DESC: Michele's attacks render Melchio immobile. Already thinking about her next adventure, Michele leaves the area, but then...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51118_DESC: Duel-GX tries to explain to Michele just how strong Melchio truly is, but she dismisses the information claiming her victory is imminent.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51119_DESC: Melchio is able to turn off his auto-mode when he feels Duel-GX's presence, but claims he has no need for a world without his creator.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51120_DESC: Melchio's power grows and is somehow resurrected. After berating her heartbroken friends, Michele goes after Melchio by herself...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51121_DESC: Inspired by Michele's unbroken resolve, her friends decide to stand up and fight once more. Knowing they are behind her, Michele faces Melchio anew.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51122_DESC: Duel-GX readies Code 666 to fight against the berserk Melchio, but Michele steps in of her own accord to try to stop them both.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51123_DESC: Duel-GX's power and that of Melchio's clash, opening a gate to another world. Michele means to enter the gate in order to bring Duel-GX back...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51124_DESC: Michele is able to stop both Duel-GX and Melchio. However, Duel-GX is no longer able to move. Michele is at a loss for words when...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51125_DESC: Michele and Zelban finally acknowledge each other's power. She also takes a liking to Zelban after watching his interaction with a hatchling...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51200_DESC: Shortly after their fight with Zevalhua, Karl, Seria, and Tilith cross over to another world to defeat a demon, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51201_DESC: When Tilith's party is unable to return, Grahdens asks the Summoner to defeat a demon. However, three beings show up...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51202_DESC: Velnar loses himself to his desire to destroy. Paris tries to get the party to advance, but he doesn't listen to a word she says.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51203_DESC: Paris struggles to keep up with the rambunctious Velnar. She doesn't fear him, so Velnar grows more interested in her...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51204_DESC: Paris asks Velnar about the Sorcerer's Army he belongs to. Velnar surprises her by stating that he is a division commander.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51205_DESC: Lugina makes his way with Yuni by his side. Claiming that "Phoena's orders are absolute," Yuni discloses that she is a magic warrior.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51206_DESC: Lugina orders Yuni to tell him more about her affiliations and her world. Yuni then explains how the others and her ended up in this world.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51207_DESC: The Black Army targets Lugina and Yuni. Lugina makes an assumption based on the current situation, and Yuni's reaction is curious...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51208_DESC: Phoena accompanies the Summoner to the demon's location. However, unable to find the right words to say, she keeps silent the whole time.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51209_DESC: Phoena finds the art of summoning curious. She tells the Summoner about her world, the Three Sages, and her friend Pirika from the Volunteer Army.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51210_DESC: Phoena worries about her friends. However, since the Summoner doesn't seem to be worried, she takes this as a sign of deep trust among friends.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51211_DESC: The Summoner protects Phoena from the Black Army's sudden attack. This reminds Phoena of the Volunteer Army Captain from her world.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51212_DESC: Grahdens watches as the party arrives to the demon's lair. After saying he'll leave the demon to the youngsters, he leaves to tend to his own affairs.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51213_DESC: Everyone reports that they have defeated the demon separately. However, it doesn't seem Phoena and the others can return to their world just yet...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51214_DESC: Phoena and the Summoner are the first to arrive to the demon's lair. She is surprised to learn that the demon radiates power from her world.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51215_DESC: The Black Army appears after the demon has been defeated. Velnar and the others try to help, but the demon gains more energy and returns to life.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51216_DESC: Having finally defeated the demon, the visitors are ready to return to their own world. However, Tilith and the others are still missing...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51300_DESC: Owen tells Noah and the Summoner that a demon has appeared on Mt. Abe. Unfortunately, that's where Elise plans to have a picnic.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51301_DESC: Elise, Lin, and Sera make their way to Mt. Abe. At the same time, Noah and the Summoner try to do the same, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51302_DESC: Lin and Sera ask Elise about her job as the Raid desk receptionist. However, the conversation quickly begins to turn about Noah...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51303_DESC: Lin and Sera ask Elise about her relationship with Noah once again. Elise tells them about their time together in the Demon Slayers, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51304_DESC: The three ladies arrive at the Coliseum Ruins. Lin and Sera are taken aback when Elise suggests they climb a cliff to reach Mt. Abe.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51305_DESC: Noah and the Summoner hurry onwards. Noah explains that the demon close by presents a great danger to Elise, as she has been previously cursed.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51306_DESC: Noah and the Summoner reach Mt. Abe only to find that Seria and Karl are seconds away from defeating the demon.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51307_DESC: Though Elise is set on climbing Mt. Abe, Noah insists that she return with him. However, a deafening roar suddenly echoes about them...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51308_DESC: After defeating the enemy, Noah insists that Elise return with him once again. Elise means to comply, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51309_DESC: Elise and the others reach Mt. Abe and mean to climb to the top. However, Noah and the Summoner arrive to warn them about the demon.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51310_DESC: The demon is defeated, and Noah and Elise are left alone thanks to Lin. Noah then promises to rid Elise of her curse.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51400_DESC: The Guardians of Meirith receive new divine orders. They are to depart for Ishgria, to defeat the demon Ragruvord.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51401_DESC: Just before facing the demon, a new demon's presence becomes known. Moreover, this new deity appears to be a threat to Karna Masta.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51402_DESC: The group decides Fadahl and the siblings will return, and the other three will slay the demon. They promise to reunite later, and head for battle.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51403_DESC: After some discussion, Quaid, Diana, and Ivris decide to return to see how things are developing. However, something still seems off...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51404_DESC: Shusui appears before Fadahl, Claire, and Colt as they search for the Gate to Grand Gaia, and attacks without giving any warning or reason.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51405_DESC: Fadahl is concerned for Claire, but she has already cast off her doubts. Just as they move forward with new resolve, Shusui appears before them again.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51406_DESC: Fadahl and the others sense the presence of the gate to Grand Gaia. However, Shusui's dogged pursuit hinders their progress.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51407_DESC: Shusui states that he will let the group go for now, and vanishes. Reaffirmed in their mission, Fadahl and the others enter the gate to Grand Gaia.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51408_DESC: Shusui appears before Quaid's team as they search for a gate to Grand Gaia. They fight with all their might in order to shake off their pursuer.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51409_DESC: Ivris notices the change in Diana's attitude toward Quaid. Meanwhile, Quaid keenly senses Shusui's continued pursuit.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51410_DESC: Ivris is concerned by the lack of progress in Quaid and Diana's relationship. Then, as Quaid attempts to clarify the matter, Shusui appears.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51411_DESC: Shusui states that he will let the group go for now, and vanishes. The three prepare themselves to face what enemy awaits them in Grand Gaia.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51412_DESC: After Shusui sees through his doubts, Quaid halts his return to Grand Gaia and rejoins the group to help. All to overcome a sense of trouble ahead...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51413_DESC: Demons and gods have met in Ishgria. The demons speak to the gods, but the gods do not respond. Both sides' plots go into motion.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51414_DESC: Graham and the Guardians meet, and after they battle, he seems to be defeated. However, Graham is utterly unconcerned as he departs.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51415_DESC: Feeling the plan has failed, Quaid tells Diana and Ivris to flee. However, there is no way the two can accept that order.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51416_DESC: Everything has gone as the gods planned. The Guardians are split up, and destined to die on separate battlefields.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51417_DESC: Quaid and the others survived slaying the demon Ragruvord, but records do not state that they returned to Grand Gaia.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51418_DESC: Colt is still hostile toward Quaid. While Claire is out scouting, Fadahl tells Colt about Quaid.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51419_DESC: Quaid's decision causes the gods' plot to collapse. With all members present, the Guardians of Meirith face their foes to protect one another.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51420_DESC: The Guardians of Meirith survive their battle with the gods, and reaffirm their bonds with each other. As they do, a lone demon appears before them.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51600_DESC: Grahdens sets off to investigate an alien power with the Summoner. Meanwhile, Karl and Seria run into two young women...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51601_DESC: The Summoner departs to defeat the foreign power, and a demon connected to it, in order to help Asahi and Nozomi get back to their homeworld.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51602_DESC: Asahi and Nozomi tell the Summoner about their world, where those living battle against those who seek to create a new world...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51603_DESC: Karl tells Asahi and Nozomi of Grand Gaia and Elgaia's past and present. After hearing about this piece of history, the two ladies' reaction is...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51604_DESC: The group splits into two teams, and search for the area where Shesha's power is most palpable. Which road will the Summoner choose?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51605_DESC: Asahi and the Summoner head towards the city in ruins. There, Asahi ponders the possibility of a different future.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51606_DESC: Asahi recalls the anguish tied to the struggle against the gods, hoping for someone strong to aid her. Shortly afterwards, Karl and Seria chime in...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51607_DESC: Asahi feels conflicted after witnessing the Summoner's true power. However, there is no time for small talk when battle calls...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51608_DESC: Asahi lectures the Summoner on the responsibilities of those with power. However, Karl has his own thoughts on the matter.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51609_DESC: The Summoner passes a mountain with Nozomi in order to reach a temple just ahead. There, Nozomi opens up about her concerns back home...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51610_DESC: As the Queen of Fairies, Nozomi is torn between following her dreams and yielding to responsibility. Which path should she take?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51611_DESC: Nozomi wonders about the reason behind the Summoner's will to fight. The Summoner wonders the same thing as well, but continues forth regardless.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51612_DESC: Grahdens enlightens Nozomi on the reasons behind the Summoner's indomitable fighting spirit, to which Nozomi reacts to by...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51613_DESC: The Summoner runs into a curious spirit named Navarre. He seems to be in some sort of trouble...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51614_DESC: Navarre sets up a meeting between the Summoner and a young lady named Isabeau. It would seem she knows Asahi and Nozomi as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51615_DESC: The Summoner sets off on a survey mission alone with Isabeau. However, Tilith suddenly appears and...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51616_DESC: Isabeau fights for the sake of humanity's hope. She can relate fighting alongside the Summoner to fighting with her comrades back home.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51617_DESC: Isabeau warns the Summoner about the future. What will the Summoner and Tilith do once the time to choose has finally come?
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51618_DESC: After treating Tilith quite harshly, Isabeau tells the Summoner not to run away when the time to make a decision comes.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51619_DESC: Tilith can feel an alien power, along with the presence of a demon, nearby. Meanwhile, Isabeau feels the presence of Shesha, and prepares to fight.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51620_DESC: A gate to another world has opened, and just as Isabeau prepares to return to her world, she leaves some words behind for Tilith and the Summoner...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51700_DESC: The 7 leaders of the Demon Slayers have departed to survey Ishgria. However, they encounter a massive demon, and are separated from Griff...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51701_DESC: Krantz and the others encourage Mirfah, who worries about Griff. They head for the return gate, as Griff instructed.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51702_DESC: Sensing Griff's strength in combat, Shusui states that he will grant Griff "another chance to fight" and retreats.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51703_DESC: Griff reaches a resolution and faces Shusui in order to prevent him from heading after Krantz and the rest.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51704_DESC: Griff seemed to have lost to Shusui. However, he sacrifices his own life to deeply injure Shusui's leg.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51705_DESC: Krantz worries that he is not fit as acting commander. Just as everyone reassures him that's not so, the earth rumbles and a demonic beast appears.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51706_DESC: Krantz and the rest fight bravely. However, the demonic beast's attacks shatter the earth and separate them. Iris tries to act on her own, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51707_DESC: Guided by Mora, Iris heads to where her friends are waiting. However, she has seen through Mora's lies.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51708_DESC: Iris and Mora are locked in battle. But suddenly, a duplicate of the demonic beast appears, and takes Iris's life...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51709_DESC: Rhoa has an idea to use the devices in the ruins to drive off the demonic beast, and sends Krantz and the others ahead. But then Kafka returns...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51710_DESC: Rhoa suffers a life-threatening wound from the demonic beast. He tells Kafka to run so he can let the devices run wild, but she can no longer move.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51711_DESC: Having sensed the strength of the demon Kalon, Krantz and Libera entrust Mirfah with the report and send him ahead, alone.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51712_DESC: In order to keep Kalon away from Mirfah, Krantz and Libera unleash a final, desperate attack...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51713_DESC: Mirfah arrives at the location of the gate home. However, it is nowhere to be found. To add to his worries, a demonic beast appears before him.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51714_DESC: Having defeated the demonic beast, Mirfah is enraged that the group has been abandoned and swears revenge on Grahdens and Owen.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51715_DESC: Krantz and the others resolve to seek the return gate. Meanwhile, Griff thinks of a way to save himself from certain death.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51716_DESC: Mirfah is summoned from the future by Amu Yunos. Given a "second chance," he takes action to change his fate.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51717_DESC: The future Mirfah intervenes in Griff and Shusui's battle. However, he accidentally yells Griff's name...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51718_DESC: As Griff faces Shusui, the future Mirfah appears again and forcibly enters the fray.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51719_DESC: Having suffered a deep leg wound at Griff and the future Mirfah's hands, Shusui attempts to show his true power, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51720_DESC: The future Mirfah shields Iris from the demonic beast's attack. Afterwards, he learns Iris's true nature, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51721_DESC: The future Mirfah stops Rhoa's attempt to make the devices in the ruins run wild. Kafka appears and suspects Mirfah of being an enemy, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51722_DESC: Rhoa and Kafka drive off the demonic beast. They no longer distrust the future Mirfah, but they gradually come to realize Mirfah's true nature...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51723_DESC: Holding off the demon Kalon, Krantz and Libera let Mirfah go ahead. Soon after, the future Mirfah appears and asks to join them.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51724_DESC: Krantz and Libera defeat the demon Kalon alongside the future Mirfah. As the two worry over his injuries, Mirfah urges them along.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51725_DESC: The demonic beast that has pursued the group appears before Mirfah as he searches for the return gate. He steels himself and prepares for battle...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51726_DESC: Griff and the rest save Mirfah's life, and finally defeat the demonic beast. Amu Yunos says "the real fight begins here," and then...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51727_DESC: The future Mirfah protects Griff and the rest from shadows as they leap into the dimensional gate. Then Amu Yunos appears before him...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51900_DESC: While lost in thought, Sera says something to herself that sounds important. Lin just happens to pass by at the time and overhears it...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51901_DESC: Elise can't hide her surprise at seeing Sera show her girlish side. Meanwhile, Lin imagines what kind of person Sera's lover might be.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51902_DESC: Lin and Elise worry about Sera, who seems tired. The two discuss reasons for why she meets her lover away from the Randall Empire...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51903_DESC: Elise is still troubled by Sera's offhanded words to herself. Lin worries with her, but a sudden realization changes the direction of their thoughts.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51904_DESC: Sera's probable lover's name is revealed. As soon as she hears it, Elise becomes even more lost in her imagination than Lin is.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51905_DESC: The three lose track of Sera. Elise asks the Summoner to look out for Lin, who has hurried ahead, but immediately after catching up with her...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_51906_DESC: Lin and the Summoner are relieved after defeating the demonic beast. They encounter Elise afterward, but Sera is with her and seems distraught...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52000_DESC: Reed and the others continue their journey, leading the people based on Lucana's vision. They arrive in Mistral, the site of the promised land, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52001_DESC: Reed and the others have finally arrived in Mistral, the site of the promised land. The scouts didn't encounter any formidable foes, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52002_DESC: Aneil is uncertain about the route they've chosen. Then, suddenly Nevsky appears to share some advice.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52003_DESC: Nevsky decides to accompany Reed's group. Aneil sings Nevsky's praises, but the others seem unconvinced...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52004_DESC: As they continue on their travels, Rhein suggests they go separate ways. Noticing something odd, Reed tells him to stop, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52005_DESC: Sensing a God Army ambush, Rhein goes on the offensive. During a lull in the fighting, the disciple Zurg appears before him.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52006_DESC: Told of another force sent to ambush the people by Zurg, Rhein spurs himself in to motion in order to intercept them despite his injuries.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52007_DESC: Rhein is disturbed by the low number of enemies, but then discovers another force from the God Army.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52008_DESC: Having eliminated the God Army soldiers nearby, Rhein asks Avant, a man who appeared on the scene, to come with him. However...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52009_DESC: Avant encounters the human forces gathered to save the people. Having discovered the God Army, the humans decide to face them together.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52010_DESC: Seeing the low number of God Army forces, Avant realizes their main force has moved on already. He is furious at having arrived too late.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52011_DESC: Having united with the human forces, Avant soon faces the disciple Zurg and enters into battle to quell the people's fears.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52012_DESC: Avant's attacks pin down and overwhelm Zurg. Realizing that further attacks on the humans are impossible, Zurg retreats.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52013_DESC: Reed's group continues moving despite their feelings about Rhein's departure. However, a God Army force is headed their way.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52014_DESC: Reed's group struggles against the imposing God Army force. Realizing there's something only he can do, Aneil reaches a decision...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52015_DESC: Aneil succeeds in drawing off the God Army. In addition, the newly-arrived reinforcements he called are...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52016_DESC: Realizing he has been tricked, Aneil burns his own life force to hold Mare back and asks Nevsky to eliminate the enemies.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52017_DESC: Mare has encircled the group with traps, but then a man appears and breaks through them!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52018_DESC: Avant struggles with the God Army's traps. He suspects a battle happened nearby, but can't advance the way he wants to...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52019_DESC: Realizing that the countless God Army traps are meant to slow him down, Avant assumes an enemy will be waiting just past them.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52020_DESC: Eru suggests leaving behind the people who can't keep up with the marching pace. Reed is enraged and the situation gets explosive...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52021_DESC: Having rushed to defend the people at the rear, Eru begins to fight back against the waves of God Army forces.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52022_DESC: Eru drives off the God Army forces assaulting the people, but then immediately becomes aware that someone is fighting nearby.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52023_DESC: Though injured, Eru has bought time for the people to escape. He was prepared to die, but then an aged swordsman appears...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52024_DESC: Dolk has discovered the human forces. He resolves to fight with them to save the people, then the demon Graham appears...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52025_DESC: Dolk is injured in Graham's ambush. Eru arrives to help and lets him escape while she faces Graham, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52026_DESC: Having caught up to the human forces, Dolk enters the fray with the God Army. Frustrated by Dolk's presence, the demon Graham takes personal action.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52027_DESC: Deciding to withdraw from his battle with Dolk, Graham tells Dolk that the God Army vanguard he led is pursuing the people.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52028_DESC: Reed and Lucana reach the location shown in her vision. They move the people through the "gate" they see there, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52029_DESC: Reed and Lucana have driven off the demonic beast. The people finish their evacuation, but the group's comrades still haven't returned...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52030_DESC: Reed and Lucana's comrades return after the demonic beast is defeated. They tell of the people who saved them, and move to return the favor.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52031_DESC: Realizing the people are somewhere safe, Avant and Dolk prepare for a final battle against a demonic beast!
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52032_DESC: Avant and Dolk are exhausted and prepared to die. But just then, Reed's group arrives to lead them to the new world.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_52033_DESC: Having driven off the demonic beast, Reed and the others offer to aid Avant and Dolk and ask them to join them in the new world as well.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53000_DESC: As the God Army mounts the offensive, Sirius is pressed for a decision by crown princess Selvia, his elder sister.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53001_DESC: Having cleared the main gate, Sirius realizes the enemy's main force has moved east and sends help for Sareas.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53002_DESC: Having just finished fighting at the east gate, Sareas notices the enemy reinforcements at the same time he sees his own.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53003_DESC: Sareas encounters an enemy with an overwhelming aura. Deciding this is the enemy leader, he challenges this new foe...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53004_DESC: Sareas challenges the disciple, but his attacks have no effect. As he struggles for his life, he sees...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53005_DESC: Dure shielded Sareas from Kajah's attack. As Sareas looks on aghast, Dure has something to tell him...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53006_DESC: Sirius notices that the Bariuran soldiers are moving slowly. Immediately after, Melina appears.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53007_DESC: Berdette fights frantically to protect the townsfolk. Then Feleen appears before her and gives her a certain item.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53008_DESC: Sirius attempts to head for the palace to investigate rumors that the emperor has fled. He invites Berdette along, but...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53009_DESC: Radia is exhausted by the endless God Army assault. Arriving on the scene, Sirius attempts to save her and eliminate their foes.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53010_DESC: On hearing that her royal father has fled, Radia asks herself what he, the crown princess, and the others are planning.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53011_DESC: Having encountered the disciple Kajah, Sirius resolves to win for the sake of his sisters and the people. He prepares for a fair fight...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53012_DESC: Sensing Sirius's internal conflict during their battle, Kajah tells him that it will lead to greater sins and then departs.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53013_DESC: Sirius and Kajah are locked in a fierce battle until Myuze intervenes to stop them...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53014_DESC: Sirius finally arrives at the palace, but then resolves to slay the beast he finds attacking it.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53015_DESC: Sirius faces Selvia at the palace. Pressed for a decision once again, he elects to go along with the emperor's plan...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53016_DESC: Myuze gives Sirius first aid while struggling with her mixed emotions toward the imperial siblings' bond.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53017_DESC: The beast's savagery has Sirius fighting for his life, but Myuze sacrifices herself to save her brother with a purifying spell.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53018_DESC: Sirius faces Selvia at the palace, and refuses to go along with the emperor's plan. He declares that he will fight only for the common people.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53019_DESC: Sirius rushes to his siblings, who have been driven back almost to the palace. As he arrives, the disciple Kajah also appears.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_53020_DESC: Kajah grants Sirius's wish and passes away. Afterwards, the siblings set off with newly-strengthened resolve...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_60010_DESC: Just when you thought Noel was depressed that the Summoner had cleared most of the Trials, you find a new one prepared for you.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_60011_DESC: When the Summoner visits the Summoners' Research Lab, Noel states that he's made a place where Summoners and their units can test themselves together.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70000_DESC: The Summoner battles an otherworldly warrior who has appeared from the Vortex. After winning, the Summoner learns more about the young man...
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70001_DESC: Stahn claims to have come from a world called Liafyse. The Summoner and him later run into an acquaintance of his as they survey the Vortex.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70002_DESC: Stahn and Rutee try to recall how they ended in Grand Gaia, but to no avail. They both set off to find the rest of their comrades with the Summoner.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70003_DESC: The Summoner and friends exhaust themselves fighting countless foes, when Rutee spots her friend Rita. Stahn spots something too--a shadow.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70004_DESC: After meeting Rita, the situation becomes clearer. The party leaves the preparations for their return home to her, and set off to find the others.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70005_DESC: Rutee recalls that the Vortex is unstable, making her party's return home even more difficult. Meanwhile, Stahn spots Arche flying across the sky.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70006_DESC: Stahn reunites with Arche, who is concerned about the lack of Mana in the area when compared to Liafyse. Afterwards, they make their way to see Rita.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70007_DESC: Stahn, who gets along well with the Summoner, invites his new friend to come with him. Rutee, however, disagrees judging the current state of things.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70008_DESC: The party sights Cress fighting off a monster, and assists him. They then head to Rita's location and bump into Arche, who has news for them.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70009_DESC: Milla shows up, and in her own way, has already made sense of the whole situation. She has also figured out the identity of the shadow after them.
entries.MST_SCENARIO_70010_DESC: The six stranded warriors from Liafyse have reunited, and are ready to attempt their trip back home. The Summoner helps them, and sends them off.
